EXPERIENCE.Name: Experience
EXPERIENCE.ToolTip: Points until you reach the next level

MOVEMENT.Name: Movement
MOVEMENT.ToolTip: Number of tiles unit can move to

SPEED.Name: Speed
SPEED.ToolTip: Determines how often unit can perform an action

DEFENSE.Name: Defense
DEFENSE.ToolTip: Determines how much damage is inflicted upon the unit.

AREA_OF_EFFECT_RANGE.Name: Area Of Effect Range
AREA_OF_EFFECT_RANGE.ToolTip: Area of Effect Range of action.

STEALTH.Name: Stealth
STEALTH.ToolTip: Ability to remain undetected by enemies.

INTELLIGENCE.Name: Intelligence
INTELLIGENCE.ToolTip: Affects magic efficiency and puzzle-solving capabilities.

CHARISMA.Name: Charisma
CHARISMA.ToolTip: Influences interactions with NPCs and party morale.

LUCK.Name: Luck
LUCK.ToolTip: Affects the probability of rare events and critical successes.

RESILIENCE.Name: Resilience
RESILIENCE.ToolTip: Ability to resist status effects and environmental hazards.

AGILITY.Name: Agility
AGILITY.ToolTip: Determines turn order and evasion rate.

WISDOM.Name: Wisdom
WISDOM.ToolTip: Impacts magical defense and skill learning rate.

ENDURANCE.Name: Endurance
ENDURANCE.ToolTip: Affects stamina and resistance to fatigue.

FOCUS.Name: Focus
FOCUS.ToolTip: Improves concentration and accuracy in attacks.

PERCEPTION.Name: Perception
PERCEPTION.ToolTip: Enhances awareness and detection of hidden items or traps.

WILLPOWER.Name: Willpower
WILLPOWER.ToolTip: Determines resistance to mind control and morale loss.

FAITH.Name: Faith
FAITH.ToolTip: Influences the effectiveness of divine magic and miracles.

SANITY.Name: Sanity
SANITY.ToolTip: Affects mental health and resistance to psychological effects.

INFLUENCE.Name: Influence
INFLUENCE.ToolTip: Determines the character's ability to sway others' decisions.

ALCHEMICAL_AFFINITY.Name: Alchemical Affinity
ALCHEMICAL_AFFINITY.ToolTip: Enhances crafting and effectiveness of potions.

CRAFTING_SKILL.Name: Crafting Skill
CRAFTING_SKILL.ToolTip: Determines ability to create and repair items.

LEADERSHIP.Name: Leadership
LEADERSHIP.ToolTip: Boosts team morale and effectiveness in group battles.

SURVIVAL.Name: Survival
SURVIVAL.ToolTip: Enhances ability to endure harsh environments and forage.

STEALTH_DETECTION.Name: Stealth Detection
STEALTH_DETECTION.ToolTip: Ability to detect hidden or stealthy enemies.

POISON_RESISTANCE.Name: Poison Resistance
POISON_RESISTANCE.ToolTip: Decreases damage and effect duration from poisons.

ARCANE_MASTERY.Name: Arcane Mastery
ARCANE_MASTERY.ToolTip: Improves effectiveness of arcane spells and skills.

TACTICAL_AWARENESS.Name: Tactical Awareness
TACTICAL_AWARENESS.ToolTip: Enhances strategic decision making in battle.

BEAST_TAMING.Name: Beast Taming
BEAST_TAMING.ToolTip: Ability to tame and command creatures.

ALCHEMY.Name: Alchemy
ALCHEMY.ToolTip: Skill in creating potions and elixirs.

ENCHANTMENT.Name: Enchantment
ENCHANTMENT.ToolTip: Ability to imbue items with magical properties.

BARTERING.Name: Bartering
BARTERING.ToolTip: Improves trading skills and reduces item costs.

MEDITATION.Name: Meditation
MEDITATION.ToolTip: Accelerates mana regeneration and mental recovery.

SMITHING.Name: Smithing
SMITHING.ToolTip: Skill in forging and repairing weapons and armor.

LORE_KNOWLEDGE.Name: Lore Knowledge
LORE_KNOWLEDGE.ToolTip: Understanding of history and ancient texts.

TRAP_MASTERY.Name: Trap Mastery
TRAP_MASTERY.ToolTip: Skill in setting and disarming traps.

NAVIGATION.Name: Navigation
NAVIGATION.ToolTip: Ability to orient and move efficiently in various terrains.

LINGUISTICS.Name: Linguistics
LINGUISTICS.ToolTip: Proficiency in different languages and dialects.

RITUALISM.Name: Ritualism
RITUALISM.ToolTip: Skill in performing magical and religious rituals.

SIEGE_WARFARE.Name: Siege Warfare
SIEGE_WARFARE.ToolTip: Effectiveness in siege tactics and using siege weapons.

DIPLOMACY.Name: Diplomacy
DIPLOMACY.ToolTip: Skill in negotiating and managing alliances.

HUNTING.Name: Hunting
HUNTING.ToolTip: Proficiency in tracking and hunting wildlife.

SAILING.Name: Sailing
SAILING.ToolTip: Skill in navigating and handling boats and ships.

HERBALISM.Name: Herbalism
HERBALISM.ToolTip: Knowledge of plants and herbs for medicinal and magical uses.

ENGINEERING.Name: Engineering
ENGINEERING.ToolTip: Skill in constructing and understanding complex machinery and structures.

BOTANY.Name: Botany
BOTANY.ToolTip: Knowledge about plant species and their practical uses.

ASTRONOMY.Name: Astronomy
ASTRONOMY.ToolTip: Understanding of celestial bodies and events.

CRYPTOGRAPHY.Name: Cryptography
CRYPTOGRAPHY.ToolTip: Ability to decode and encode secret messages.

BEAST_KNOWLEDGE.Name: Beast Knowledge
BEAST_KNOWLEDGE.ToolTip: Understanding of creatures' habits and weaknesses.

DIVINATION.Name: Divination
DIVINATION.ToolTip: Ability to foresee events and gather insights.

ILLUSIONISM.Name: Illusionism
ILLUSIONISM.ToolTip: Skill in creating and dispelling illusions.

NECROMANCY.Name: Necromancy
NECROMANCY.ToolTip: Control over the dead and the dark arts.

SUMMONING.Name: Summoning
SUMMONING.ToolTip: Ability to call forth creatures and entities to aid.

PHARMACOLOGY.Name: Pharmacology
PHARMACOLOGY.ToolTip: Knowledge of drugs and their effects on the body.

GEOMANCY.Name: Geomancy
GEOMANCY.ToolTip: Ability to manipulate earth and stone.

CLIMATOLOGY.Name: Climatology
CLIMATOLOGY.ToolTip: Understanding of weather patterns and their effects.

PSYCHOKINESIS.Name: Psychokinesis
PSYCHOKINESIS.ToolTip: Ability to move objects with one's mind.

TELEPATHY.Name: Telepathy
TELEPATHY.ToolTip: Ability to read thoughts and communicate mentally.

WARDING.Name: Warding
WARDING.ToolTip: Skill in creating protective barriers and seals.

SHAMANISM.Name: Shamanism
SHAMANISM.ToolTip: Connection with spirits and the natural world.

MYSTICISM.Name: Mysticism
MYSTICISM.ToolTip: Understanding and harnessing of mysterious forces.

ELEMENTAL_AFFINITY.Name: Elemental Affinity
ELEMENTAL_AFFINITY.ToolTip: Natural alignment with a specific element, enhancing related abilities.

AURA_READING.Name: Aura Reading
AURA_READING.ToolTip: Ability to perceive and interpret the energy of living beings.
